allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add camera conflict detection, color palettes, and UI improvements

- Add camera category system with conflict detection \(vintage-lofi, antique,
  modern-cinema, etc.\) to prevent incompatible parameter combinations
- Block conflicting atmospheres, visual presets, and DOF options based on
  selected camera type with visual warning indicators
- Add fixed lens support for cameras without interchangeable lenses \(GoPro,
  iPhone, VHS, Polaroid, etc.\) showing locked lens info instead of dropdown
- Add Color Palette section with 10 preset palettes \(Teal & Orange, Noir,
  Cyberpunk, Sunset, Ocean, Pastel, Earthy, Sepia, Forest, Golden Hour\)
- Add Custom palette option with 6 individual hex color input boxes
- Change "Characters" label to "Character Description"
- Set Creative Controls to OFF by default
- Move data definitions to module level to fix variable hoisting runtime error

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
